title: [Feat]: Add options to disable touchpad pinch/zoom gestures
body:
### Describe the feature

Add a toggle to disable or enable the pinch/zoom gestures

### Motivation

I am on a laptop running fedora 42 with gnome 48 wayland. I use touchpad gestures a lot with 3 fingers swipe to change between apps on the same virtual desktop and 4 fingers swipe to change virtual desktop. Only for this portal teams app I got weird issues on the touchpad gestures. Sometimes on the app it register as a pinch/zoom instead of doing the 3 or 4 fingers gestures. I dont have this issues using the official pwa ms teams on microsoft edge.

I always use this apps full screen.
